attributes.action: not attend the World Cup Final on Saturday in Paris to support England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most Scots support "anyone but England" therefore Gordon Brown's "support" for England is inappropriate and not welcome to England the nation and England the rugby team

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
